PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ProvisionForVoid
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Properties common to the definition of a provision for void as a special type of an instance of IfcBuildingElementProxy. A provision for void is a spatial provision that might be resolved into a void in a building element. The properties carry requested values.

PropertyDef.Name: Shape
PropertyDef.Definition: The shape form of the provision for void, the minimum set of agreed values includes 'Rectangle', 'Round', and 'Undefined'.

PropertyDef.Name: Width
PropertyDef.Definition: The requested width (horizontal extension in elevation) of the provision for void, only provided if the Shape property is set to "rectangle".

PropertyDef.Name: Height
PropertyDef.Definition: The requested height (vertical extension in elevation) of the provision for void", only provided if the Shape property is set to "rectangle".

PropertyDef.Name: Diameter
PropertyDef.Definition: The requested diameter (in elevation) of the provision for void, only provided if the Shape property is set to "round".

PropertyDef.Name: Depth
PropertyDef.Definition: The requested depth or thickness of the provision for void.

PropertyDef.Name: System
PropertyDef.Definition: he building service system that requires the provision for voids, e.g. 'Air Conditioning', 'Plumbing', 'Electro', etc.
